text: Ej zanoni Pajomʙar, sumo dar manzalatu ʙuzurgi monandi digar zanon nested, agar az Alloh ʙitarsed ʙo icro namudani farmudahojas va dur ʙudan az nofarmonihojas, pas, ʙa odamoni nomahram ʙa narmi suxan magued, to on marde, ki dar qalʙi u maraze ast, ʙa tama' aftad. Va suxani pisandida ʙigued, ki on dur az sak va tiʙqi sariat ʙosad
